description:
D2s awakening. Takt`s hometown being attacked, and Cosette`s death. This was all a part of Sagan`s plan. Shindler wants to get rid of all those inferior to him in this desolate world. After learning the truth about Cosette`s death, Takt charges at Shindler in a blind rage. But Takt is injured by Hell. As she witnesses Takt injured and bleeding, Destiny feels some emotions welling up inside of her that she`s never felt before...
Source: crunchyroll
